name: Game Of Life (itch) (Skill Games Studio)
description:
Game of Life is a game about passing trough a level as fast as you can, before dying of old age. You have 100 seconds to complete a level, before you get old, and die. Most of the physical actions, you make, will take away your time, so spare them! It's a Ludum Dare 44 entry.

Controls:

A,D - Left, Right

Space - Jump

E - Use (climbing ladders)
